ngiemboon: À gwǒon ńtó, pɔ́ zye tsìʼte.
en: As soon as he came, they began to doubt.

ngiemboon: Lepfo gweté, tsǒon tɔ̌ɔn n kaa píi.
en: The cola ran out, I didn't take any.

ngiemboon: À jǔ tsɔ̌ mêngáb pɔ́ fʉ̀ʼɔɔn.
en: He bought the other chicken right away.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n gwǎa tó mbà à gʉ̌a ne tsɔ́ jʉʼ.
en: Before arriving, he had gone somewhere.

ngiemboon: Ná ngáb né mèŋ tsɔ̀ɔ móm mbʉ́a.
